to raise/to dig up/to poke/to prick/to incite/to stir up

sentences.english: I want to all don't pick trouble to anything, also hands -off or teach other people.
sentences.chinese: 我要对任何事都不挑毛病，也不干涉或教训别人。

sentences.english: It was easy to pick holes in his argument.
sentences.chinese: 在他的论据里挑毛病并不难。

sentences.english: Being skeptical and seeking faults are two completely different things.
sentences.chinese: 保持怀疑和挑毛病完全是两码子事。

sentences.english: All does not find fault to anything, also does not interfere or teaches others.
sentences.chinese: 对任何事情都不挑毛病，也不干涉或教训别人。

sentences.english: He is ever ready to find fault.
She seems to find faults with everything all the time.
sentences.chinese: 她似乎总是对事情都爱挑毛病。

sentences.english: It's depressing to have someone always finding fault with you.
sentences.chinese: 有人总是给你挑毛病，这让人感到很沮丧。

sentences.english: After coming in irresponsibly a chaos is carping, with respect to meeting occurrence contradiction.
sentences.chinese: 进来以后不负责任地一通乱挑毛病，就会出现矛盾。
